Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 35th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2016...
Traded from Cleveland to San Diego on 7/31/2016 (Going to SD: P Alonzo Costillo. Going to CLE: 1B Xavier Scruggs, CF Jordan Paroubeck)...
Injured on 5/31/2017 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 9/6/2021...
Had first career hit on 9/11/2021, off Adrian Rosario (LAD)...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
